Package org.openhab.core.model.thing.testsupport.hue

Class DumbThingHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandlerFactory
      • org.openhab.core.model.thing.testsupport.hue.DumbThingHandlerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThingHandlerFactory
    public class DumbThingHandlerFactory
extends BaseThingHandlerFactory
implements ThingHandlerFactory
    ThingHandlerFactory that can be switched into dumb mode In dumb mode, it behaves as if the XML configuration files have not been processed yet, i.e. it returns null on createThing(ThingTypeUID, Configuration, ThingUID, ThingUID)
    Author:
    Simon Kaufmann - Initial contribution
